packages.name: automattic/jetpack-a8c-mc-stats
packages.description: Used to record internal usage stats for Automattic. Not visible to site owners.

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-abtest
packages.description: Provides an interface to the WP.com A/B tests.

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-assets
packages.description: Asset management utilities for Jetpack ecosystem packages

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-autoloader
packages.description: Creates a custom autoloader for a plugin or theme.

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-backup
packages.description: Tools to assist with backing up Jetpack sites.

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-blocks
packages.description: Register and manage blocks within a plugin. Used to manage block registration, enqueues, and more.

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-compat
packages.description: Compatibility layer with previous versions of Jetpack

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-config
packages.description: Jetpack configuration package that initializes other packages and configures Jetpack's functionality. Can be used as a base for all variants of Jetpack package usage.

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-connection
packages.description: Everything needed to connect to the Jetpack infrastructure

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-connection-ui
packages.description: Jetpack Connection UI

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-constants
packages.description: A wrapper for defining constants in a more testable way.

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-device-detection
packages.description: A way to detect device types based on User-Agent header.

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-error
packages.description: Jetpack Error - a wrapper around WP_Error.

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-heartbeat
packages.description: This adds a cronjob that sends a batch of internal automattic stats to wp.com once a day

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-jitm
packages.description: Just in time messages for Jetpack

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-lazy-images
packages.description: Speed up your site and create a smoother viewing experience by loading images as visitors scroll down the screen, instead of all at once.

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-licensing
packages.description: Everything needed to manage Jetpack licenses client-side.

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-logo
packages.description: A logo for Jetpack

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-options
packages.description: A wrapper for wp-options to manage specific Jetpack options.

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-partner
packages.description: Support functions for Jetpack hosting partners.

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-redirect
packages.description: Utilities to build URLs to the jetpack.com/redirect/ service

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-roles
packages.description: Utilities, related with user roles and capabilities.

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-status
packages.description: Used to retrieve information about the current status of Jetpack and the site overall.

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-sync
packages.description: Everything needed to allow syncing to the WP.com infrastructure.

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-terms-of-service
packages.description: Everything need to manage the terms of service state

packages.name: automattic/jetpack-tracking
packages.description: Tracking for Jetpack

packages.name: nojimage/twitter-text-php
packages.description: A library of PHP classes that provide auto-linking and extraction of usernames, lists, hashtags and URLs from tweets.
